                                    DIPLOMA MECHANICAL ENGINEER
OBJECTIVE
Seeking an Engineering position where my experience and knowledge can
be
Utilized and further developed fully.
CAREER PROFILE
Creative with effective interpersonal skills and organizational abilities.
Strong, coordinating, planning and problem solving abilities.
Ability to work under pressure, time-sensitive, fast-paced environments.
1Experienced  at  streamlining  systems  and  operations  to  enhance
productivity.
Ability to handle projects from planning through to execution.
SUMMARY OF EXPERIENCE
27 years work experience since 1987 with 12 years Gulf 
experience.
EMPLOYMENT HISTORY
April 2010 to April 2017  
      PMV Superintendent (Plant Machinery &Vehicle Workshop 
Superintendent )
     BLACK CAT ENGG & CONST. CO
     DOHA-QATAR
           RESPONSIBILITIES
Plan, organize and control the flow of workshop work in a professional, 
timely manner.  Ensure that all Plant machinery and vehicles are safe and 
road-worthy, driven by trained drivers, repair and maintenance of all 
types of hydraulic ,pneumatic operated  machinery , Heavy Construction 
Equipment such as Cranes Dozers, Graders, Shovels, Excavators, Backhoe
Loaders,  Vibratory Rollers, Plate compactors ,Tamping Rammer, Concrete
Vibrator Needle Poker, Portable Air Compressors, Welding 
Machines(Lincoln&Miller), Generators up to 1500kva, Dewatering Pumps 
and all plant machinery etc.  Heavy/Light transport and goods vehicles, 
tippers, trailers, tankers and buses.  Manage the fleet of vehicles and 
ensure that the company vehicles and equipments are repaired and 
maintained to the highest standards. Planning inventory of spare and fast 
moving spares of vehicle, plant and machinery Manage the stores 
inventory and ensure that the spares are available at all times to rectify 
the breakdowns immediately and to put back in operation the fleet and 
heavy equipments and all plant machinery vehicle (PMV).  Planning and 
Effecting predictive & preventive maintenance schedules for various 
machinery and equipment to increase machine up time &equipment 
reliability. Managing Safety health and environment at work site . 
Costing analysis and repair analysis of  vehicle and plant machinery.   
Manage Operation, Maintenance and Troubleshoot all types of problem 
related to mechanical utilities like vehicle ,plant & construction 
machinery. 
•   May 2008 to June 2009
Machine Shop Supervisor
2KREMENCO
(KUWAIT INDUSTRIAL REFINERY
MAINTENANCE & ENGINEERING

S.A.K. KUWAIT.
